entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
